SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
cat "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" | grep "STARTED:" > /dev/null 2>&1 RC=$?
if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then echo "Rollback is not neccessary or can not be implemented. Exiting ..." exit 0 fi
echo "Implementing Rollback on the STARTED instances." echo "Warning: if server states are modified after finishing START_SERVER, this implementation may fail."
!Stop all started server instances (next Action) :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER# NE "" : SET &IS_SERVERS_STARTED# = "YES" : PUBLISH &IS_SERVERS_STARTED#,,WORKFLOW exit 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF
!Stop JBoss EAP Standalone or Domain Controller. :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVICE_NAME# NE "" echo "Stoppping JBoss using Service ..." "&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVICE_NAME#" start :ELSE JB_PID="`cat "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" | sed 's/STARTED:PID=//' | tr -d ' '`" echo "JBoss PID is $JB_PID. Killing process ..." kill -TERM $JB_PID :ENDIF : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="quit" | grep "Failed to connect to the controller"` if [ -z "$output" ]; then echo "Failed to stop JBoss EAP (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#). Rollback fails ..." exit 1 else echo "JBoss has been stopped. Rollback successful." exit 0 fi
